name: Survive The Maze
description:
Survive the Maze will be a head-to head MOBA-lite themed after the Greek myth of the minotaur's labyrinth.

You play as the minotaur defending your maze from intruders and the light they carry. In the dark, the walls become mist (use your imagination, please :-D) and you can go anywhere. But the walls become real again when the light strikes them.

Your goal is to extinguish the torches of all the intruders. You will lose the game if you are exposed to the light for too long. Be quick, and don't get out-maneuvered by the AI! Click to move. Tilde (`) for debugging stuff

I created this in 4 days for the AI and Games jam. This was my first game jam ever, and I intend to continue this project with light, sound, etc. My next major step is to start writing my own shaders, adding 3D models, as well as fixing some of the more rushed bits of code.
